description:
Is it a technological marathon?
Is it a intelectual challenge?
It’s Hackacity!
Discover the city’s data and improve the citizen’s quality of life!
Create your team and join this challenge to:


Evaluate and improve the data generated by the city


Build tools, analysis and models, based on Porto’s open data, that can support the development of solutions useful for the city’s citizens


Descove valid, potentially useful and comprehensible new patterns



Complete agenda, Prize and Evaluation criteria
Visit our website: hackacity.eu/porto



About Hackacity
Hackacity is a hackathon which challenges data scientists and enthusiasts to enrich the data provided by the city so they can be used to think and develop solutions that have impact in the life of city’s citizens and visitors.
Everything started in the year 2015, in Porto, when 7Graus and the City Hall of Porto decided to gather the technological community to create solutions and to trigger a co-creation environment. The initiative happened for several editions in Porto and afterwards extended to other European and Brazilian cities.
Now, on the forth edition in Porto, we want to increase the level technological and intelectual challenge level.
name: Hackacity Porto 2019
